title: Constant Lag
body:
I've been getting 170 - 200 ping for around 2 days now and i have no idea why, there is no one using the internet in the whole house except for me.
I have run the repair tool multiple times and have uninstalled and reinstalled the game nothing seems to work, I've also checked if i have high ping in other games and it turns out it's only LoL. If anyone can help me out it would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
Ive got the same issue, 180 ping on League and everything else is fine.
